sense.def:
A joke
je nekaj, kar nekdo reče ali stori, da nas spravi v smeh, na primer smešna zgodba.

seg.quote: Dave was telling me this joke about a penguin.

sense.def:
To joke
pomeni pripovedovati smešne zgodbe ali govoriti stvari, ki so zabavne in ne resne.

seg.quote: Don't worry, I was only joking.
His colleagues regard him as a joke.
